## LintLevel enum

Determines the way how a linter error will be reported

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum LintLevel 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  error | <code>&quot;error&quot;</code> | Print the error on error output (usually stderr) and report a failure which can be a non-exit code or a higher-level linter (e.g. ESlint) error. |
|  info | <code>&quot;info&quot;</code> | Only print error to standard output (usually stdout) |
|  off | <code>&quot;off&quot;</code> | Don't report anything |
|  warning | <code>&quot;warning&quot;</code> | Print the error on error output (usually stderr) |
